DataElement.preferredName: Dental Professional Practice Periodontal Treatment Interval Other Criterion Maintenance Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the interval for periodontal treatment maintenance in a dental professional practice for criteria different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the interval for periodontal treatment maintenance in a dental professional practice for criteria different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Property.preferredName: Periodontal Treatment Interval Other Criterion Maintenance
Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment of the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth.:The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Criteria; a basis for comparison; a reference point against which other things can be evaluated.:The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of the gums, soft tissues, and bones that support the teeth.
The period of time or the distance separating two instances, events, or occurrences.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.
